summary: This mod adds to the game spell Cure Disease.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=4][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color] [color=#00ff00]G[/color]ovno[color=#00ff00]W[/color]riter

[size=5]Mod like press 'Like'. Don't like write why...[/size]

  [color=#00ff00] This[/color] mod adds to [color=#00ff00]the[/color] game spell Cure [color=#00ff00]Disease.[/color]

  [color=#00ff00]To[/color] find it you will be able in the tavern[color=#00ff00] "[/color]Sleeping giant[color=#00ff00]"[/color] in one of the [color=#00ff00]rooms.
[/color]
